Verses: 1 benyameen Puththirare, Neengal Erusalemin Naduvilirundhu Egamaaik Koodiyodi, Thekkovaavil Ekkaalam Oodhi, Pedhkereminmel Adaiyaalamaagath Theevelichchan Kaattungal; Oru Theengum Magaa Sangaaramum Vadakkeyirundhu Thondrugiradhaayirukkiradhu.
2 selvamaai Valarndha Roobavadhiyaana Seeyon Kumaaraththiyaip Paazhaakkuven.
3 meyppar Thangal Mandhaigalode Avalidaththukku Varuvaargal; Avargal Avalukku Virodhamaai Sutrilum Koodaarampottu, Avanavan Than Than Sthalaththil Meyththu,
4 avalukku Virodhamaai Yuththancheyya Aayaththampannungal Endrum, Maththiyaanaththildhaane Naam Poyerumpadikku Ezhundhirungal; Aiyo! Pozhudhu Saaindhu, Andhi Nizhalgal Neendupogiradhe;
5 ezhundhirungal, Naam Raakkaalaththilaagilum Poyeri, Avaludaiya Aramanaigalai Azhippom Endrum Solluvaargal.
6 senaigaludaiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Marangalai Vetti, Erusalemukku Virodhamaaik Koththalam Podungal; Adhuve Visaarikkappadavendiya Nagaram; Adhin Utpuramellaam Kodumai.

7 ootraanadhu, Than Thanneerai Surakkappannumaappola, Adhu Than Theengai Surakkappannugiradhu; Adhile Kodumaiyum Azhimbum Ketkappadugiradhu; Dhukkamum Kaayangalum Niththamum Enakku Munbaagak Kaanappadugiradhu.
8 erusaleme, En Aaththumaa Unnaivittup Piriyaadhapadikkum, Naan Unnaippaazhum Kudiyatra Dhesamum Aakkaadhapadikkum Buththikel.

9 dhraatchakkulaigalai Arukkiravanaippola Un Kaiyaith Thirumbak Koodaigalinmel Podendru Solli, Avargal Isravelil Meedhiyaayirundha Kaniyaith Dhraatchachchediyin Kaniyaippola Nandraaip Porukkikkondupovaargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 avargal Ketkumpadi Naan Yaarode Pesi Echcharippen? Avargaludaiya Sevi Viruththasedhanamillaadhadhu; Avargal Ketkamaattaargal; Karththarudaiya Vasanam Avargalukku Nindhaiyaayirukkiradhu; Adhinmel Avargalukku Viruppamillai.

11 aagaiyaal Naan Karththarudaiya Ukkiraththaal Niraindhirukkiren; Adhai Adakki Ilaiththupponen; Veedhigalilulla Pillaigalinmelum, Vaalibarudaiya Koottaththinmelum Egamaai Adhai Ootrividuven; Purusharum, Sthreegalum, Kizhavarum, Pooranavayadhullavargalunkoodap Pidikkappaduvaargal.

12 avargaludaiya Veedugalum, Avargaludaiya Kaaniboomigalum, Avargaludaiya Manaivigalode Egamaai Anniyar Vasamaagum; En Kaiyai Indha Dhesaththin Kudigalukku Virodhamaaga Neettuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 avargalil, Siriyormudhal Periyormattum, Ovvoruvarum Porulaasaikkaarar; Idhuvumallaamal Theerkkadharisigalmudhal Aasaariyargalmattum Ovvoruvarum Poiyar.
14 samaadhaanamillaadhirundhum Samaadhaanam Samaadhaanam Endru Solli, En Janaththin Kaayangalai Merpoochchaaik Gunamaakkugiraargal.

15 avargal Aruvaruppaanadhai Seydhadhinimiththam Vetkappadugiraargalo? Parichchedham Vetkappadaargal, Naanavum Ariyaargal; Aadhalaal Vizhugiravargalukkulle Vizhuvaargal; Naan Avargalai Visaarikkun Kaalaththil Idarundupovaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

16 vazhigalile Nindru, Poorva Paadhaigal Evaiyendru Kettu Visaariththu, Nallavazhi Enge Endru Paarththu, Adhile Nadavungal; Appozhudhu Ungal Aaththumaavukku Ilaippaarudhal Kidaikkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargalo: Naangal Adhile Nadakkamaattom Engiraargal.
17 naan Ungalmel Kaavalaalaraiyum Vaiththu, Ekkaala Saththaththukku Sevikodungal Endrum Sonnen; Avargalo: Naangal Ketkamaattom Engiraargal.
18 aagaiyaal Jaadhigale, Kelungal; Sabaiye, Avargalukkul Nadakkiradhai Arindhukol.

19 boomiye, Kel; Indha Janangal En Vaarththaigalaik Kelaamalirundhu, En Nyaayappramaanaththukku Sevikodaamal Adhai Veruththuvidugiraargal; Avargalmel Naan Avargal Ninaivugalin Palanaagiya Theengai Varappannuven.
20 sebaavilirundhu Varugira Thoobavarkkamum, Dhooradhesaththinudaiya Sugandhappattaiyum Enakku Ennaththukku? Ungal Sarvaangadhaganangal Enakku Viruppamalla; Ungal Paligal Enakku Inbamaayiraadhu.
21 aagaiyaal Idho, Naan Indha Janaththukku Idaralgalai Vaippen; Avaigalmel Pidhaakkalum, Pillaigalum, Kudiyaanavanum, Avanukkaduththavanum, Egamaai Idarundu Azhivaargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
22 idho, Vadadhesaththilirundhu Oru Janam Vandhu, Boomiyin Kadaiyellaigalilirundhu Oru Periya Jaadhi Ezhumbum.

23 avargal Villum Velum Pidiththu Varuvaargal; Avargal Kodiyar, Irakkamariyaadhavargal; Avargal Saththam Samuththira Iraichchalukku Samaanamaayirukkum; Seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Avargal Enakku Virodhamaaga Yuththasannaththaraaik Kudhiraigalinmeleri Aniyaniyaaga Varuvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
24 avargal Varugira Seydhiyaik Kettom; Nammudaiya Kaigal Thalarndhadhu; Idukkam, Karppavadhikku Undaagum Vedhanaikkoppaana Vedhanaiyum Nammaip Pidiththadhu.
25 vayalveliyile Purappadaadhirungal; Vazhiyilum Nadavaadhirungal; Sutrilum Saththuruvin Pattayamum Bayangaramumundu.
26 en Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiye, Nee Rattaik Kattikkondu, Saambalile Purandu, Ore Puththiranukkaaga Dhukkikkiradhupola Manankasandhu Pulambu; Paazhaakkugiravan Sadidhiyaai Nammel Varuvaan.
27 nee En Janaththin Vazhiyai Arindhukollavum Sodhiththuppaarkkavum Naan Unnai Avargalukkulle Thurugamaagavum, Aranaagavum Vaiththen.
28 avargalellaarum Murattaattamaana Agangaarigalum, Thootriththirigiravargalumaayirukkiraargal; Avargal Vengalamum Irumbumaanavargal; Avargalellaarum Kettavargal.
29 thuruththi Vendhadhu; Eeyam Neruppinaal Azhindhadhu; Pudamidugiravanudaiya Prayaasam Virudhaavaaippoyitru; Pollaappugal Atruppogavillai.
30 avargal Thallupadiyaana Velli Ennappaduvaargal; Karththar Avargalaith Thallivittaar.
